column4: hey guys, i accidentally deleted all my kick ass pictueres off my camera.  there is a photo recovry tool, called testdisk, but it seems to want a drive, it can't access my camera directly.  i dont have a card reader, i just do it through my usb camera.  so i guess i should mount the camera in one of my drives or mount it as another drive?
Card readers are only about $10 now.
fair enough, if i have to, but i figure i can just mount it?
